name: Light Keeper (CappedMonke)
description:
Light Keeper is a cooperative shooter where players take on the role of robots fighting against mechanical insects in an underground mine. The goal of the game is to combat waves of enemies and free the mine. Players can upgrade their skills and equipment to face the challenges and successfully complete the mission. The game offers a blend of action, strategy, and cooperation and can be played alone or with friends.

Disclaimer

The game is close to feature complete but far from finished: testing and balancing are not included yet. So feel free to experience the concept, but don't expect a full fledged, bugfree or balanced game.

Controls

Move = WASD
Jump = Spacebar
Settings = Escape
Shoot = Left Mouse Button
Aim = Right Mouse Button
Flare (only McCree) = Q / 1
